meanings.sent1: The talented danseuses gracefully performed on stage.
meanings.sent2: The danseuses practiced their routines diligently in the studio.
meanings.sent3: The danseuses tried to dance in flippers for a funny skit.
meanings.sent4: The danseuses were like graceful swans gliding across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The audience was mesmerized by the danseuses' elegant movements.

meanings.sent1: Several danseuses were selected to join the ballet company.
meanings.sent2: The group of danseuses wore matching costumes for the performance.
meanings.sent3: The danseuses decided to form a band in their free time.
meanings.sent4: The danseuses stood out like colorful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the laughter of the danseuses as they shared stories.
